name: The Executioner: Prologue
description:
The Executioner: Prologue is a hardcore two-dimensional action platformer. The game serves as an introductory part of an epic story which narrates about an executioner’s adventures in hell. After the sudden and mysterious death you find yourself in hell. Try to escape from the world of the dead back into the normal world.
For one hour you will plunge into the atmosphere of the world of constant pain and sufferings. The dungeons are full of enemies which will make you fight hard. Your zest for life and a pole-axe in your hand will be a good argument in your fight against the associates of Satan himself.

The game by the designers of Bloody Walls and DED will impress you by good pixel graphics.
